subHeadings: I am a software engineer from

text: I have over two years of professional software engineering experience developing client-side web applications as well as enterprise APIs
I am proficient in various programming languages and technologies, including Java, Python, JavaScript, relational and NoSQL databases, CI/CD pipelines, and Google Cloud
I enjoy tackling challenges, especially as part of a team where we collaborate to design and develop solutions to complex problems
I like learning about the latest technologies and applying the knowledge to my work to achieve greater performance and efficiency

headings: A tale of two passions: art and technology
text: Growing up, two of my interests were art and technology. I enjoyed creating objects with Lego, folding origami, and designing architectural structures. At the same time, I was fascinated with the inner workings of websites and was very enthusiastic about developing my own. Today, as a software engineer, I get to combine my two passions as part of the software development process â€” putting on my artist cap when designing user interfaces and applying my interest in technology while coding applications using the latest technologies.
Design multi-page responsive web applications with Figma and develop them with modern JavaScript using React and its ecosystem of tools and packages, such as Redux
Develop scalable microservices using various technologies, including Spring Boot (Java) and Flask (Python), and test them using frameworks, such as JUnit and Karate
Develop and deploy cloud applications using the Google Cloud Platform and technologies, such as Kubernetes
Web-based todo list with a simple user interface. Features include creating, removing, and searching todos.
Minimalistic social networking Android application. Users can view and create posts, which are saved to a Parse database.
